title: Instructional Design Scenarios for a Data Science in Healthcare MOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A competency-enhancement course in medical data analysis conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, designed for learners to acquire practical skills through projects using real medical data.

learning_goals: Conducting a project to analyze patient diagnosis patterns using medical data visualization tools.

Learners Can Apply Basic Statistical Techniques (Mean, Standard Deviation, Correlation Coefficients) to Medical Datasets (e.g., Patient Diagnosis Records, Treatment Effect Data) to Derive Key Trends (Median, Distribution) and Correlations Between Variables (p-Value ≤ 0.05) and Write Reports Visualizing Results (Histograms, Scatter Plots)
Proposing solutions to healthcare field problems through data-driven decision-making processes.

resources: Open-source data analysis tools (Google Sheets, Datawrapper, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
